pr_title: Add child product channel sync status visibility at parent level

timeline.message: Show separate info for syncing product channels and children
Reintroduce button to schedule all channels product sync

timeline.bodyText:
I think this is too expensive and there is a better way to get the ID.
Check line 300: there is a map "channelByLabel" of all Channels. Please use that map to get the Channel and the ID.
timeline.author: mcalmer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -319,6 +318,10 @@ public static String data(Request request, Response response, User user) {
                                             s.getStatus(),
                                             s.getChannels().stream().map(c ->
                                                     new ChannelJson(
+                                                            s.getStatus().equals(MgrSyncStatus.INSTALLED) &&
+                                                                    ChannelFactory.lookupByLabel(c.getLabel()) != null ?
+                                                                    ChannelFactory.lookupByLabel(c.getLabel()).getId() :
+                                                                    -1L,

timeline.author: mcalmer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -365,6 +368,10 @@ public static String data(Request request, Response response, User user) {
                         rootExtensions,
                         syncProduct.getChannels().stream().map(c ->
                                 new ChannelJson(
+                                        syncProduct.getStatus().equals(MgrSyncStatus.INSTALLED) &&
+                                                ChannelFactory.lookupByLabel(c.getLabel()) != null ?
+                                                ChannelFactory.lookupByLabel(c.getLabel()).getId() :
+                                                -1L,

timeline.bodyText:
Nitpick: (this is totally matter of taste, so disregard it, if you don't like it.)
I found an alternative syntax to be more readable:
Optional.ofNullable(channelByLabel.get(c.getLabel()))
    .map(chan -> chan.getId())
    .orElse(-1L)
timeline.author: hustodemon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -319,6 +318,10 @@ public static String data(Request request, Response response, User user) {
                                             s.getStatus(),
                                             s.getChannels().stream().map(c ->
                                                     new ChannelJson(
+                                                            Opt.fold(Optional.ofNullable(
+                                                                            channelByLabel.get(c.getLabel())),
+                                                                    () -> -1L,
+                                                                    x -> x.getId()),

replies.bodyText:
I am always undecided which is better actually.
Opt.fold is more complex but Optional.ofNullable uses .map() and I don't like to map when I know it is just a single object that I have to work with, it is less intuitive in such a case. So either one way or the other in this case has pros and cons to me. And if you say the second one is clearer, I'm fine with it and I trust you more in the Java aspect. Changing accordingly 👍
replies.author: ncounter

timeline.bodyText: Same here, feel free not to agree 😉
timeline.author: hustodemon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -365,6 +368,9 @@ public static String data(Request request, Response response, User user) {
                         rootExtensions,
                         syncProduct.getChannels().stream().map(c ->
                                 new ChannelJson(
+                                        Opt.fold(Optional.ofNullable(channelByLabel.get(c.getLabel())),
+                                                () -> -1L,
+                                                x -> x.getId()),

timeline.message: Print proper channel name in the channel list detail
Drop channel sync status info in the product page
Use normal disabled checkbox instead of icon
Fix products page alternate row color
Show separate info for syncing product channels and children
Link to the channel page from product if channel exists
Reintroduce button to schedule all channels product sync
Better perfomance to get channel id if it exists
Extract and reuse the same code to generate icon sync status
Extract and reuse the same code to generate icon sync status
